name: Persons working on R&D at nonprofit organizations, by employment status and type of nonprofit organization: FYs 2020─21
description: Persons working on R&D at nonprofit organizations, by employment status and type of nonprofit organization: FYs 2020─21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: These data exclude nonprofit universities and colleges and federally funded research and development centers administered by nonprofit organizations. Detail may not add to total because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Nonprofit Research Activities FY 2021 module of the 2022 Annual Business Survey.
